Calculate Noise Correlation Functions¶

Script to calculate seismic ambient noise correlation functions. Called as a python program the script accepts the path to a yaml parameter file, reads it and calls the paracorr function with these parameters. This computation is implemented for parallel execution for example using mpirun -n 4 python calculate_noise_correlations.py monitoring_parameters.

After calculation of correlation functions those are rearranged into correlation matrices (one for each combination) that contain the whole study period by calling the merge_corr_results().

The structure of the parameter file and the functionality of the script are described in the Ambient Noise Correlation tutorial.

Function¶

paracorr Computation of noise correlation functions
merge_corr_results Combine traces and matrices
